channel.title: Discord on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Discord on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Starting your journey at Dwarves Discord
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to Dwarves Network, We’ve grown a lot since launching our Discord server since the first day we made this network grow based on developers-centric. That’s why Dwarves Discord is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Discord is where we: Share our software know-how through seminars, discussion channels & tech talks Connect with our friends, alumni, and like-minded people Build an open software network that people love to be a part of.
